Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: How fortunate is the person with a radiant heart and soul that is thoroughly and fully enlightened,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: qyrI ieh AMbr vrgI kwlI zulP mwno svyr dw burkw hY,

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And whose forehead constantly bows in the court of Waaheguru. (26) (4)

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: O Goyaa! Keep circling around his territory expecting to offer a sacrifice without bragging about it,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: jd myrw cMn svyr dI nIxdr qox auT ky bwhr AwieAw,

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: I am just waiting for a simple signal and pointer of his eyes. (26) (5)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: qwx mwno svyr dy sUrj dy muKVy nUM ausny lwAnqwx pweIAwx [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: There are thousands of studded peacock thrones littered in your way,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: jd qUM aunIxdIAwx A¤Kwx nwl bwhr AwieAw,

lines.gurmukhi: SrimMdw gSq Az rui^ qU AwPqwib subhw [17[3[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: But your devout followers stupefied by your grace have absolutely no desire for any crowns or gems. (27) (1)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: qwx qyry muKVy nUM vyK ky svyr dw sUrj SrimMdw ho igAw [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Everything in this world is destructible and ceases to exist (ultimately),

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: jd svyr dw sUrj Awpxy muKVy qox burkw lwhuMdw hY,

lines.gurmukhi: cUM br-kSd nkwb iz rui^ Aw&qwib subhw [17[4[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: But the lovers never get destroyed because they know the secrets of love. (27) (2)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: AwpxI suBwgI Awmd nwl jhwn nUM roSn kr idMdw hY [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: All eyes were anxiously intent for a glimpse of the Guru,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: jigAwsuAwx dI izMdgI inq dw jgrwqw hY,

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And thousands of minds are getting submerged (like in quick sand) in their anxiety of separation (from the Guru). (27) (3)
